mathara uyanwaththa kridanganaya sanwardhanaya kara wideshiya krikat kandayam sahabhagi wana ekdina ha thundina tharaga pawathwena krida pitiyak bawata pathkirime salasum sakaskara athayi tharuna katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathya dalas alahapperuma mahatha pawasayi.mehi palamu piyawara washayen thana thiruwa wadidiyunu kara, nawaloka krida mandapaya sanwardhanaya kirimata piyawara gena atha.

warsha 2012 /5/16 ha 2012/5/17 dina kolambaa disthrikkaye siyaluma durakathana kulunu samprekshana durakathana amathum anekuth durakathana wisthara wishleshana karamin wimarshanaya karana bawata sadahan karana rahas polisiya anawaranaya wu saka sahitha pudgalayan ananyathawa ha kriya patipatiya thahawuru kirimata mathiwarana komasaris karyalaya, pudgala liyapadinchi departhamenthuwa, aagamana wigamana departhamenthuwa haraha wisthara labagena wimarshana sidu karana bawa pawasiya.

eeta pilithuru di athi sajith premadasa amathiwaraya thama ema idama yodagena aththe niwasa nomathi pawulwalata niwasa idikaradimata misa paudgalika katayuthu sandaha nowana bawa pawasa athayi warthawe.
me sambandhayen 'ada' adala waidyawariyagen wimasimak kala athara, aya pawasuwe ema mudal krikat aayathanayen laba nogath bawayi.
eheth amarikawa aadi batahira ratawala adhi widyathmaka upakarana walin prethayan pilibanda paryeshana pawathwagena yana bawa kiyanu labe.
